summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated August 17, 2010. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged and is intended solely for the recipient. It emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: It contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
The communication is intended solely for the recipient, Jes Staley.
Unauthorized use or disclosure of the email is prohibited.
The email emphasizes the need to notify the sender if received in error.
